name: Quel cliché!
description:
This is a submission for the GameOff GameJam (2022).

Follow the Bard of a mystical journey through a land filled to the brim by odd beings and ...several cliches! Use your wits and play as best as you can with the cards you are dealt! (i mean it literally, this game has cards)

Will you come out on top or will you bite the dust?

How to play:

Download the zip file and press the QuelCliche!.exe file.

Build available only for Windows at the moment.

Comments are very much appreciated :)

Thank you for playing!! ^_^
